mapper.select: SELECT zz.zzno, zz.mno, zz.nick, zz.pic1, zz.cno, zz.titl, zz.pic2, zz.cdt2, zz.hitcnt, c.name as cName, zz.like_cnt FROM (SELECT z.zzno, z.mno, m.nick, m.pic as pic1, z.cno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, z.cdt as cdt2, z.hitcnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m ON z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.zzno = #{no} ) as zz LEFT JOIN catg c ON zz.cno = c.cno

SELECT z.zzno, z.mno, m.nick, m.pic as pic1, z.cno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, z.cdt as cdt2, z.hitcnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as reply_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.ztmp=false ORDER BY (like_cnt * 10) + reply_cnt + z.hitcnt desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT z.zzno, z.mno, m.nick, m.pic as pic1, z.cno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, z.cdt as cdt2, z.hitcnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as reply_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.ztmp=false AND z.cno = #{cno} ORDER BY (like_cnt * 10) + reply_cnt + z.hitcnt desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT z.zzno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, m.nick FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m ON z.mno = m.mno WHERE ztmp=false) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT zzno, cdt, count(*) as week_like FROM lik WHERE cdt Between AddDate(Now(),-7) AND Now() GROUP BY zzno) t2 ON t1.zzno = t2.zzno WHERE week_like IS NOT NULL ORDER BY week_like DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT z.zzno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, m.nick FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m ON z.mno = m.mno WHERE ztmp=false AND cno = #{cno}) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT zzno, cdt, count(*) as week_like FROM lik WHERE cdt Between AddDate(Now(),-7) AND Now() GROUP BY zzno) t2 ON t1.zzno = t2.zzno ORDER BY week_like DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT z.zzno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, m.nick FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m ON z.mno = m.mno) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT zzno, cdt, count(*) as week_like FROM lik WHERE cdt Between AddDate(Now(),-7) AND Now() GROUP BY zzno) t2 ON t1.zzno = t2.zzno ORDER BY week_like DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT zzno, titl, pic as pic2, hitcnt, cdt as cdt2 FROM zzal_lect WHERE ztmp=false AND cdt Between AddDate(Now(),-7) AND Now() GROUP BY zzno ORDER BY hitcnt desc LIMIT 30

SELECT z.zzno, z.mno, m.nick, m.pic as pic1, z.cno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, z.cdt as cdt2, z.hitcnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as reply_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.ztmp=false ORDER BY z.cdt desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT z.zzno, z.mno, m.nick, m.pic as pic1, z.cno, z.titl, z.pic as pic2, z.cdt as cdt2 FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno AND z.mno = #{mno} WHERE z.ztmp=false ORDER BY z.cdt desc LIMIT 10

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT zzno, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as reply_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.ztmp=false) as rowCount

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT zzno, (SELECT count(*) FROM lik WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as like_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE zzno=z.zzno) as reply_cnt FROM zzal_lect z INNER JOIN memb m on z.mno = m.mno WHERE z.ztmp=false AND z.cno = #{cno}) as rowCount
